summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1048, for the improvement of Prospect Street from the west line of Second Avenue North to the west line of Second Avenue West; First Avenue West, from Kinnear Place to Prospect Street, and First Avenue North from Prospect Street to Highland Drive, by paving and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 12174 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
